title: Tomato Basil Tart
ingredients: ['125g butter, at room temperature', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons of cold water', 'Flour for rolling', '4-6 tomatoes', '3 eggs', '60g cream cheese', '40g soured cream', '300-350g Gouda cheese, grated', 'salt and freshly ground pepper to taste', '1 bunch fresh basil']
